description: Perfect for a packed lunch or snack.
name: Pie Maker Noodle Veggie Frittatas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 packets 2 minute noodles (any flavour you like)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook noodles following packet instructions. I used the seasoning sachets when cooking the noodles, but you can use one to cook noodles and one to add to the mixture. Cut noodles into small lengths. I break them up while in their bag before cooking.
Lightly beat the eggs in a large bowl. Add the frozen veg, carrots, cheese, garlic & onion powder, salt, pepper and noodles. Stir until well combined.

Preheat your pie maker. Spoon 1/4 cup of mixture into each hole. Close lid and cook for 8 minutes on one side, then carefully flip and cook the other side for about 23 minutes. Transfer to a wire rack, and continue with remaining mixture. Making sure to thoroughly mix each time to get a bit of everything in each cup.
